detail_desc: Shorts in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a press-stud.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton with an elasticated waist and wide ribbing at the hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with long raglan sleeves, ventilating holes under the arms, seams at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Low-rise joggers in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a zip at the hems.
Blouse in airy, waffled fabric with a high collar, V-neck at the back and wide ties at the back of the neck. Long, wide puff sleeves and close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves.
Sleeveless dress with a top in cotton jersey and skirt in woven fabric. Embroidered detail on the front, patch side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, gathered shoulder panels, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, draping at the top and seams with braided trims under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top to hold the dress in place. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Satin lining.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), short, flounced sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with a tulle frill on the shoulder straps, gathers at the top and a seam at the waist with a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.

Straight-cut blouse in soft, washed cotton denim with a frill around the neckline that continues down the button band. Buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit in jersey and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie in woven fabric, a sewn-on waistcoat with buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed fit. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Layered over short jersey inner leggings.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets, pleats at the top and shaping darts at the back. Tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in airy linen jersey.
Short dress in airy chiffon with sequined embroidery, a V-neck at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with gathers in the sides for best fit. V-neck with a visible lace trim at the front, 3/4-length, lace-trimmed sleeves and a detachable tie belt.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups with roll edges at the hems.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed, ankle-length shaft with a reflective print. Ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft and soft terry inside. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.

Long, straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and concealed pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with an appliquéd chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Straight-style shirt in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist, flounces at the top and high cut at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length, fitted skirt in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a high, elasticated waist.
Shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave containing some cotton. Zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a flap and button.
Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, in  a loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, low crotch and straight  legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Shoulder bag in paper straw with an imitation leather flap and handle and metal fastener. Detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x12x18 cm.
Imitation suede sandals with a strap with a decorative bow at the front and an adjustable, elasticated ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Bra tops in cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps and unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Faux fur gilet with a button at the front. Lined.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets with a taped zip.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the top and a V-shaped opening with narrow, twisted ties at the top. Elbow-length, raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and frill trimmed seams at the waist, hips and hem. Unlined.
Dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Seam at the waist with pleats and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton with a round neck, print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a straight-cut hem.
Bomber jacket in a patterned weave with a sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Whooli Chen x H&M. Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Hood in a contrasting colour with a nylon top layer, and side seams with contrasting colour piping. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a stripe print front and back.
Coat in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
